title: How do make $100 a month through writing online? - Blogging And Marketing - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it is completely possible to make $100 a month or even $1000 a month writing online. There are some writers who are making $50,000 a month writing online but their numbers are very rare. Here how much money I have made from a single writing source in the last month.  I know this isn’t a living wage or in western standards, it would roughly last for two or three days but if you are living in a developing country then this amount of money is enough for your 1 month of living expenses plus other utility charges, I, being a student in a developing country thinks that this amount of money is way enough. There are hundreds of ways to make money through writing online.  Writing and making money on Medium: Luckily, I discovered Medium through a Quora answer. I started writing on the platform but enroll in their partner program just five months ago. The medium business model revolves around readers who pay $5/month and writers who publish their best work on Medium. You can read Aamir Kamal's answer to Is giving $5 to Medium per month worth it? in Blogging And Marketing Medium pay you based on Medium member read time like Skillshare. If you want to make $100 or more in a month then follow the following pattern every single day. Write, write, and write.Write quality stories and publish every day,Target popular publications to make more money.Write high-quality stories for the readers and the medium curators might curate your story in a topic. Curation is everything on Medium.Built your own newsletter. Writing on Quora I got two content writing job offers because of writing on Quora. You could make a huge amount of money (More than $1,000 a month) just writing for free on Quora and didn’t expect an instant reward. Asim Qureshi startup grows from $5 Million in worth to more than $95 Million just because of writing on a Questions and answers platform known as Quora.  Start your own blog I have made over $1k per month just writing about a specific niche and the AdSense will pay me every 22nd of the month. Starting a blog didn’t cost you a lot of money and you could potentially make more revenue if you have great keyword researching and content writing skills. Here are some tips you could use on your blog posts to rank it higher in the search engines and make more money; Write Super-long form content, I mean more than 3,000 words blog posts.Write every day, don’t just write about anything but instead, target a specific niche and do proper keyword research. This is what people called “Working smart”Build a habit of writing.Here is the interesting thing; You can also syndicate your blog posts published on your blog on Medium and can generate two revenue streams with a single article. I hope this will helps.

Write reviews about products on a blog. People LOVE reviews. Promote a product you know or can relate to. You can find products to promote on click bank. Each post on the blog will be a different product, with the affiliate link on the post somewhere. Then, promote that blog post on social media. Fb & Instagram are best. Find products you like, are popular, & ones that your friends may want. Also, narrow down your search as best you can. It’s actually counterproductive to preach to lots of people. Target people that NEED a product, not people that are just interested
